Title: The New Industrialists | Cerence AI is transforming the in-car experience
Description:
Discover how Cerence AI is transforming the in-car experience with their new XUI conversational voice assistant and mobile work AI agent, launched in partnership with Microsoft at CES. Hear from Raja Bose discuss the seamless, secure integration of Office 365 apps into vehicles, hybrid AI models for natural voice interaction, and the future of AI-powered journeys beyond the car.

Learn more: https://msft.it/6056QDxPn

#Microsoft #Manufacturing #IndustrialAI
Author: Microsoft Cloud
